ygData.subject: Re: What is Kiting?
ygData.msgSnippet: Pretty easy...run around and brusco your attacker to death, dragging him like a kite on a string of his affection for you.  It works best with mobs who think
ygData.messageBody:
Pretty easy...run around and brusco your attacker to death, dragging him
like a kite on a string of his affection for you. It works best with
mobs who think they can kill you. Don't waste it on greens cause once
they get too damaged they'll run. Don't try it on red guys cause your
brusco may not work on them but it is great on blues, whites and most
yellows. I think it best to do it with things that you will benefit a
great deal from doing it with cause it is obviously pretty time
comsuming for just one kill. I hear some people do it with COD but I am
not brave enough for that.

Cooter

-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. Beeba [mailto:flpmc@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:03 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] What is Kiting?


From: "Mr. Beeba" <flpmc@...>

One question...what is kiting and how is it done? I have seen this a
lot in
this group, but I am sorry, I have never heard of it before.
